*Leo joined*
Initial release

"Resolve javascript website keep popping up ("Home", after login)
"
 "Remove unused permissions"

*Francis joined*
 Implement "About" tab

 Divide "Home" into "Login" and "School Website" tabs


Improve dashboard performance

 Resolve fragments not inflating for larger screens

 Resolve elements not always blocked

 Resolve blank documents to be able to be opened

 Resolve calendar wrong time problem (new calendar)

 Support orientation

 Support offline Pdf Viewer (only for School Calendar, 3C Half Day Schedule and The Notice of the month)
Add translation for Chinese
Improve "About" UI
Add "Settings" for changing between languages and themes

 Support for dark theme
Improve pdf viewer by adding a scroll bar and page separator
"*Andrew joined*

" "Add "Intro Screen"

" "Implement auto internal updater
"
"Resolve set theme misbehaving

" "Ask for "Install Unknown Apps" permission
"
"Implement "Album (limited due to website limitations)" and "Latest News" in "School Website"

" "Add "Splash Screen" to cover blank loading screen
"
"Improve "Intro" UI to fit larger screens

" "Redesign "School Website" (give up webview)
" "Clear internal code warnings"
"Implement "Intranet", and "Borrowed Books" in "Login""
"Clears cache after each update to save storage space

" "Redesign "Login" (give up webview)

" "Improve "Latest News" UI

" "Improve "Changelog" UI

" "Improve overall performance by separating tasks to a different thread"

" "*Michael joined*

" "Increase gaps between scrollbars and lists

" "Large heap for less memory phones"
"Read label

" "Renew books

" "Inter-class support (2D and 3C)

" ""About" has a new Github repo image instead of the school logo

"Alpha State:

"Beta State:

"Stable State:
